title: Heart of  Oak Park Mi~3 Bed/1 bath downtown Royal Oak.#
posting_body: Make this 3 bed ranch in Oak Park your new home!
This home features a spacious living room with hardwood flooring.
All bedrooms has fresh new carpet and painting.
The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops.
Also, the bathroom is fully remolded.
This home sits on a large lot with a fenced backyard and detached 2 car garage!
Just 7 minutes from downtown Ferndale and 10 minutes from downtown Royal Oak.
